text: Orit Rozin is an Israeli historian. She is a professor of Jewish history at the University of Tel Aviv. Donna Robinson Divine, writing in The New Rambler in 2016, described Rozin as "one of a new generation of scholars building their careers around an exploration of Israel's social, cultural and political history." ==Books== * Duty and Love: Individualism and Collectivism in 1950s Israel (Chaim Weizmann Institute for the Study of the History of Zionism and Israel at Tel Aviv University/Am Oved, 2008) * The Rise of the Individual in 1950s Israel: A Challenge to Collectivism (Brandeis University/University Press of New England, 2011)Zweig, Ronald W.
